TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Expression extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This type supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks No member of this class is public. The class supports expression modes for setting dependency property values, such as <xref:System.Windows.DynamicResourceExtension> and <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>.
